pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Further Understanding the Context for the Solution and Maximizing Value</Introtext>
pageContent.title2: Meeting with Dr. Cardonza – Further Understanding the Context for the Solution and Maximizing Value
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Which follow-up question do you ask Dr. Cardonza?</welcomeText>

choice.choiceText: A. What training do you have for your department, so they are prepared to provide care that will lead to high patient satisfaction?
B. As a prescriber, I’m sure you sometimes encounter roadblocks with different insurance plans, Medicare, and Medicaid. What strategies do you have in place to overcome those roadblocks?
C. What other obstacles do you anticipate facing as you focus on achieving your patient treatment goals?
D. Is there a specific patient satisfaction metric that you want to reach?
